translations: adj.骚乱的，动乱的；（气流）湍流的，（水）湍急的； 骚动的，混乱而难以控制的；（技）（与）紊流（有关）的，（与）湍流（有关）的

sentences.sentence: I had to have a boat that could handle turbulent seas.
sentences.translation: 我必须有一条能应付汹涌海浪的船。

sentences.sentence: Wars and conflicts have subjected people living in this area to turbulent life.
sentences.translation: 战争与冲突使该地区的人民过着动荡不安的生活。

sentences.sentence: A turbulent business environment also has senior managers cautious of letting vague pronouncements cloud their reputations.
sentences.translation: 动荡的商业环境也让高级管理人员变得小心翼翼，以免含糊的声明玷污了他们的声誉。
